Texts.Chs: 当生命值低于25%最大生命值时，会立即使用背包中的药膏、绷带、医药包和纳米绷带。如果你有多种，效果更强，速度更快的会被首先使用。技能再次发动之前的冷却时间与所使用的治疗物品的持续时间等长，如果你已经受到治疗物品的影响，这个技能将不会发动。
Texts.Eng: Salves, Bandages, Medpacks, and Nanowrap Bandages in your inventory are instantly used when Health falls below 25% Max Health. If you have some of each, the stronger, faster ones are used first. The cooldown before this effect can happen again lasts as long as the duration of the healing item that was used, and the effect does not occur if you are already under the effect of a healing consumable.

Texts.Chs: 医者工作台允许你用更少的材料制作治疗消耗品！
Texts.Eng: The Medic Station allows you to craft healing consumables using fewer materials.

Texts.Chs: 当你的生命值超过50%最大生命值时，10格附近的友好玩家和NPC会获得轻微的生命值再生。
Texts.Eng: When your own Health is above 50% Max Health, nearby friendly Players and NPCs, up to 10 blocks away, gain slight Health Regeneration.
